瑻字的基本解释

瑻
kūn
古同“琨”。

瑻字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kūn］
［《廣韻》古渾切，平魂，見。］
亦作“瑻1”。
(1)玉石。
(2)见“琨珸”。

瑻字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑻； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页740第14
【廣韻】古渾切【集韻】公渾切，?音昆。【說文】石之美者。【書·禹貢瑤琨篠簜釋文】琨，音昆。美石也。本作瑻。韋昭音貫。【前漢·地理志】引書亦作瑤瑻。【註】師古曰：瑻，音昆。美玉名也。

瑻字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瑻字的起名意思

暂无。

瑻
Basic explanation of words
瑻
kūn
The ancient same "kun".
瑻
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kūn］
["Guangyun" Gu Hun cut, Ping Hun, see. ]
Also known as "瑻1".
(1) Jade.
(2) See "Kunxin".
瑻
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑻; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 740 14
[Guang Yun] Ancient Hun cut [Ji Yun] Gong Hun cut,? Yin Kun. [Speaking of the text] The beauty of stone. 【Book·Yugong Yugong Yaokun Xiao簜Interpretation】Kun, Yinkun. Mishiki also. This is a 瑻. Wei Zhao Yinguan. [Previous Han Geography] The cited book is also called Yaorong. [Note] Shi Gu said: Yu, Yinkun. The beautiful jade name is also.
瑻
